attributes.action: Internet providers give us one phone number to keep kids safe online
attributes.additional_details:
Make it easier for parents to put on parental controls.  At the moment we find -

* It is too easy for children to bypass controls

* Filters either block too many sites or don’t block unsafe ones

*Giving my child the password to access a safe site means they can use it when prompted on an unsafe site

*Adults who want unfiltered access are prompted for passwords too often

 84% of children aged 5 to 15 access the Internet at home.

We want one phone call to our Internet Provider, and they then put on safe, appropriate and workable controls on all our devices.
